trans-unit.source: Do you forget your password?
Please click the following button to start the password recovery process.
trans-unit.target: 点击以下按钮，发送密码重置邮件。

trans-unit.source: Go to Password Recovery Page
Password Recovery
What is your father's / mother's former name?
What is last 5 digits of your driving license number?
trans-unit.target: 你身份证或者驾驶证后4位？

trans-unit.source: What is your first crush's name?
What is your finished elementary school?
What is region name of your domicile of origin?
Your Secret Question
Your Answer for the Question
Sent you a mail for completing your password recovery. If you cannot receive the mail, please retry a password recovery process.
trans-unit.target: 发了一封密码找回的邮件到你邮箱。如果没有收到电子邮件，请重试密码找回流程。

trans-unit.source: Secret Question Configuration
Secret Question
Answer for Secret Question
Please input your e-mail address. Invitation for %1% will be sent to your e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 请输入邮件地址。邀请信息%1%将发送到你的邮箱。

trans-unit.source: Sent you an invitation for %1%.
Begin your registration from a URL in the mail.
We accepted your recovering password request.
trans-unit.target: 我们接受你的密码找回请求。

trans-unit.source: Please click the following URL and complete password recovery process.
trans-unit.target: 点击以下地址完成密码找回。

trans-unit.source: Please input your new password.
Your password is now changed.
